pages.home_page__hero_section__desc: MaxAI.me is a generative AI browser tool that lets you use personalized AI power at your fingertips, right on any webpage and PDF. Join MaxAI.me and make your browser smarter than ever before!
pages.home_page__one_click_magic__item1__desc: Enhance your browsing with '1-click AI': Highlight text to access a context-sensitive AI menu with various tools. Set up custom prompts to streamline repetitive tasks and boost your efficiency.
pages.home_page__one_click_magic__item2__desc: Revolutionize your online searches with our AI-powered search optimization.Query like you would on Google, and our AI refines it, delivering concise, combined answers from various sources. This enhances your searches with clear insights, eliminating the need to individually browse each link.
pages.home_page__one_click_magic__item3__desc: Explore AI's forefront with our diverse suite of models: Enjoy unlimited access to GPT-4-turbo, ChatGPT-16k, Claude variants, Gemini beta and more. Our platform includes a broad array of AI providers, keeping you at the technological forefront.
pages.home_page__one_click_magic__item4__desc: Enhance your digital writing on Gmail, LinkedIn, Twitter, and many other platforms with our AI assistants. Effortlessly draft emails, create social media posts, and engage professionally, as our AI generates and refines content to perfectly resonate with your audience.
pages.home_page__one_click_magic__item5__desc: Seamlessly engage with content through our AI tools: Chat about PDFs, YouTube videos, or webpages for contextual insights and detailed summaries. Enhance your digital media interaction and consumption experience.
pages.home_page__one_click_magic__item6__desc: Streamline your AI experience with 1-click prompts for faster task execution, customizable language settings, and adjustable ChatGPT responses. Our web copilot offers deep insights for complex queries, enhancing each interaction.
pages.home_page__professional_ability__item1__: Executives and business owners use MaxAI for quick, informed decision-making with its rapid research and market insights. Its efficient communication tools also streamline internal and external interactions, enhancing leadership and business growth.
pages.home_page__professional_ability__item2__: In marketing and customer relations, MaxAI boosts engagement and content creation with fast market research and consumer insights. Furthermore, its fast AI composing function enhances customer interactions and feedback, ensuring a more personalized and responsive consumer experience.
pages.home_page__professional_ability__item3__: MaxAI is used in education for tasks like curriculum development, generating interactive learning materials, and assisting with administrative duties. It enhances the efficiency of educators and offers innovative ways to engage students.
pages.home_page__professional_ability__item4__: In consulting, MaxAI aids in drafting reports, preparing presentations, and analyzing market trends. It streamlines the process of gathering and interpreting data, which is crucial for consultants to provide informed advice to clients.
pages.home_page__professional_ability__item5__: HR professionals utilize MaxAI for managing employee records, automating routine inquiries, and facilitating the recruitment process. It improves efficiency in handling employee-related tasks and assists in maintaining organizational compliance.
pages.home_page__professional_ability__item6__: Executives in financial services use MaxAI for risk analysis, market forecasting, and financial reporting. It provides deep insights into market trends and supports informed decision-making in financial planning and investments.
pages.home_page__professional_ability__item7__: Realtors benefit from MaxAI in creating property listings, conducting market analysis, and communicating with clients. It enhances the effectiveness of marketing strategies and assists in providing personalized services to clients.
pages.home_page__professional_ability__item8__: Engineers and technicians use MaxAI for its sophisticated analytics, aiding in efficient, innovative solution development. It supports data analysis and efficient communications, improving accuracy and productivity in technical fields.
pages.home_page__professional_ability__item9__: MaxAI adapts to diverse roles, offering quick research and efficient communication across various industries. Its versatility makes it a valuable asset for tasks beyond conventional categories, enhancing productivity and innovation in any field.
pages.home_page__why_me__reason2__desc: The fastest way to use AI anywhere online.
pages.home_page__why_me__reason3__desc: Works literally everywhere - ANY text on ANY website, even local PDF files.
pages.home_page__why_me__reason4__desc: 1-click to insert or replace selected text with AI-generated content.
pages.home_page__why_me__reason5__desc: Chat to ask follow-up questions or refine results.
pages.home_page__why_me__reason6__desc: Supports all popular AI Providers: ChatGPT, Google Bard, New Bing Chat AI, Claude.
pages.home_page__why_me__reason7__desc: Supports GPT-4, Web Browsing, Code Interpreter, and Plugins through your ChatGPT Plus account.
pages.home_page__why_me__reason8__desc: Supports GPT-4, GPT-3.5-turbo-16k, GPT-4-32k using your OpenAI API key.
pages.home_page__call_to_action__sub_title: The fastest way to use AI anywhere online.

prompt_library.edit_prompt_modal__field__title__placeho: A clear and informative title attracts more users to your prompt template.
prompt_library.edit_prompt_modal__field__description__p: Provide a concise description of your prompt template and potential results users can expect.
prompt_library.delete_prompt__title: Are you sure you want to delete this prompt template?

modules.footer__desc: MaxAI.me is a Chrome extension for writing, summarizing, spellchecking, altering tone, translating, or replying to text on websites.
modules.plan_features_table__set_up_your_own_pro: Use your own prompts to speed up repetitive tasks as you work.
modules.plan_features_table__chatgpt__tooltip_de: As fast as ChatGPT Plus. No country restrictions. Powered by gpt-3.5-turbo.
modules.plan_features_table__chatgpt_4__tooltip_: OpenAI's most capable model, great at tasks that require creativity and advanced reasoning.
modules.plan_features_table__chatgpt_16k__toolti: Enhanced version of ChatGPT with 4x context window than its predecessors.
modules.plan_features_table__claude__tooltip_des: Anthropic's fastest model, 100K context window, great for very long document and code analysis, summarization, and comprehension.
modules.plan_features_table__claude_2__tooltip_d: Anthropic's 2nd iteration of model for enhanced capabilities, 100K context window, great for tasks ranging from sophisticated dialogue and creative content generation to detailed instruction.
modules.plan_features_table__gemini_tooltip_desc: Google's most capable and general model. Built from the ground up for multimodality. Gemini on MaxAI is currently in the beta phase, supporting only text and code, will soon add support for images, videos, and audio.
modules.plan_features_table__summarize_chat_with: Chat with AI about any webpages: The AI understands the page context, allows you to get summaries, ask specific questions, and delve into details seamlessly.
Chat with AI about any Youtube videos: The AI understands the video context, allows you to get summaries, ask specific questions, and delve into details seamlessly.
modules.plan_features_table__ai_powered_search__: Query or search as you would in Google, and let our AI automatically refine queries, sift through search results, and deliver concise answers by combining and inferring answers from multiple sources for you.
modules.plan_features_table__search_with_AI__too: Enhance your Google search: Let AI combine and infer answers directly from search results, offering you clear insights without browsing through each link yourself.
modules.plan_features_table__summarize_chat_with: Chat with AI about any PDF files: The AI understands the file context, allows you to get summaries, ask specific questions, and delve into details seamlessly.
Chat with AI about any email threads: The AI understands the file context, allows you to get summaries, ask specific questions, and delve into details seamlessly.
modules.plan_features_table__pdf_ai_viewer__tool: Interact with PDFs by chatting with AI: Get summaries, ask questions, and seamlessly access context-rich information.
modules.plan_features_table__gmail_writing_assis: Let AI generate entire email drafts and replies for you in seconds, and perfect your Gmail draft & reply in one click.
modules.plan_features_table__facebook_writing_as: Enhance your Facebook posts and replies with AI-driven drafts and suggestions, ensuring your content resonates with your Facebook followers.
modules.plan_features_table__linkedIn_writing_as: Boost your LinkedIn professional interactions using AI-enhanced, context-sensitive drafts and rapid responses.
modules.plan_features_table__xtwitter_writing_as: Craft compelling tweets or reply to posts with instant AI-generated content tailored for your needs on X/Twitter.
modules.plan_features_table__youtube_writing_ass: Quickly reply to comments using AI-assisted drafts in your YouTube Studio, making channel management more efficient!
modules.plan_features_table__outlook_writing_ass: Let AI generate entire email drafts and replies for you in seconds, and perfect your Outlook draft & reply in one click.
modules.plan_features_table__instagram_writing_a: Enhance your posts and replies with AI-driven drafts and suggestions, ensuring your Instagram content resonates with your followers.
modules.plan_features_table__one_click_prompts__: Turn your hours-long everyday tasks into minutes with our expanding collection of ready-to-use prompts.
modules.plan_features_table__ai_response_languag: Set AI to always reply in your chosen language.
modules.plan_features_table__chatgpt_temperature: Control AI response randomness. A lower temperature makes AI responses less random, more deterministic, and repetitive.
modules.plan_features_table__web_access_copilot_: Get answers to the hardest questions with comprehensive web insights.
modules.plan_features_table__web_access_advanced: Choose from the world's top search engines, get more search results, specify search time range and region, and select AI response language with Web Access.
modules.faq_list__question1__desc: The basic features of MaxAI are free, including a daily limit on AI requests. For access to advanced features, an upgrade is required.
modules.faq_list__question2__title: How do I cancel my paid plan?
modules.faq_list__question2__desc2: and click 'Manage my subscription' to cancel your subscription.
modules.faq_list__question3__title: Do the model request limits of the paid plan apply to my own API key?
modules.faq_list__question3__desc: No, these usage limits are specific to models like GPT-4 that are directly operated by MaxAI. If you're on a paid plan and using your own API key, you can use any models linked with it without any usage limits set by MaxAI. For more details on usage limits, please see our
modules.faq_list__question4__desc: You can use MaxAI.me on any website on any Chromium-based browsers (like Chrome and Edge) to compose, improve writing, summarize, explain, fix spelling & grammar, translate, or reply to any text.
modules.faq_list__disclaimer_part1: By subscribing, you are enrolling in automatic payments. Cancel or manage your subscription through Stripe's customer portal from "My Plan". All services are delivered according to the
